text: Ate jadom' tusim unham nu dekhom tam unham de sarira tuhanu cage lagade hana. Ate jekara uha gala karade hana, tam tusim unham di gala sunade ho. Samajho (unham di'am galam, bhasana isa taram hana) jivem lakaram hana, jihari'am kadha nala kharhi'am hona. Uha hareka uci avaza nu (tom darade) apane virudha samajhade hana. Iha loka tuhade vairi hana. So inham tom baco. Alaha unham nu nasata kare, uha kithe bhatakade phirade hana
